title: #394: The Most Hated Man on the Internet
description:
Who is the most hated man on the internet? Wouldn’t he just love for us to tell you his name. But we aren’t going to. Instead we are going to shout out Charlotte Laws, a mother and a campaigner who fought to have photos of her daughter taken down from a website that prided itself on so-called “revenge porn” and ruining people’s lives.

Jim and Laura analyze the three part Netflix series “The Most Hated Man on the Internet”, pinpointing the psychopathic characteristics of an offender who reveled in the humiliation and exploitation of his victims.

Laura explains why the term “revenge porn” is not appropriate and Jim & Laura discuss why it should be a federal crime. You won’t want to miss this.
